name: Syntaxblocks
tagline: Experimental UI for mobile touchscreen code viewing/authoring
body:
### Specify program behavior from your phone, without input frustrations

Coding on the screen of your mobile device can be painful. This is a silly little thing I thought of on the train
to see if I could get anywhere with this problem. 

### ASTs and SPTs

It _should_ be possible to specify program behavior with just swipes and large-target taps. I think. Skipping the code and working directly with the Syntax Tree seems like it could be a good start. Interpreting the Syntax Tree as a Space Partitioning Tree seems like it'd be an efficient way to display the information on a tiny screen.
